definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: The wood, she said, was used to make desks and chairs for the students.
sentences.chinese: 這些木材，她說，是用來給學生打製課桌椅的。

sentences.english: The body of a dragon made of black gold and encrusted with diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 惡龍的周身是用黑金打製，鑲鑽。
